div.a: Two IHS Students Named Nat'l Merit Scholarship Finalists

div.div: Sound financial decisions are the foundation for a strong, well-managed school district.
Classrooms are the most influential stage for the delivery of education.
Student involvement and engagement inside and outside of the classroom helps to develop well-rounded citizens.
Facilities and physical components of the Independence Local Schools are resources to be responsibly utilized to meet the needs of our students, parents, community and staff.
Our schools belong to, and are a reflection of, the community.

div.span: At Independence Local Schools, we are purposeful and intentional about the strategic decisions we make for our future. We recognize our community’s rich history and strong traditions and, as we move forward, we will strengthen our educational product to meet and exceed the expectations of our students, families, and community.

EDUCATION ADMINISTRATION CENTER
